translation.en: Up into the wind. Get out the small boat.
translation.zh: 逆风而行 别撞上小船

translation.en: -I can't tell. Why don't you get-- -Get that painter.
translation.zh:
-看不清楚 为何不…
-去拿缆绳
抓住那条绳子 基尔尼

translation.en: Come on, get that boat in.
There's two of them, sir. A man and a woman.
translation.zh: 先生 船上有两人 一男一女

translation.en: "We therefore commit their bodies to the bosom of the waters
translation.zh:
“我们在此将他们的身体
投入大海的怀抱中

translation.en: to be turned into corruption looking for the resurrection of the body
translation.zh:
随着肉体的消失
希望他们能够获得重生

translation.en: when the sea shall give up her dead and the life of the world to come...
translation.zh:
到时大海将会臣服
全世界的命运将会
掌握在主耶稣基督的手上

translation.en: The surgeon would like to have a word with you, sir.
translation.zh: 医生有话想跟你说 船长

translation.en: The sickness in the crew, sir.
You've got five more taken down since midwatch.
translation.zh: 从午夜班开始 又有五个人病倒

translation.en: Your cabinet is full of bromide. Now, leech it out.
translation.zh:
你的药柜里很多溴化物镇静剂
发放给他们
不是出血这么简单 船长

translation.en: I look to your medical knowledge.
translation.zh: 我就指望你的医学知识了

translation.en: Three days after we left Moorea, you thought it was scurvy.
translation.zh:
我们离开莫雷阿岛三天后
你以为他们得了坏血病

translation.en: Half the crew took sick. You told me it was breakbone fever.
translation.zh:
有一半船员病了
你告诉我他们得了登革热

translation.en: The symptoms weren't for certain. Now I know.
translation.zh: 当时症状并不明显 现在我明白了
不能掉头回去吗 船长？

translation.en: There's no port for a plague ship.
translation.zh: 没有港口会收容有瘟疫患者的船

translation.en: Drop anchor at the first island.
translation.zh: 我们一看到岛屿就立刻抛锚

translation.en: With due respect, Captain, that small boat put off from somewheres.
translation.zh:
恕我直言 船长
那艘小船一定是来自附近某个地方

translation.en: This is a French naval chart.
translation.zh: 这是法国海军航海地图
上面只标着警告的字眼
有暗礁 环状珊瑚岛

translation.en: This is a cruel turn for Mrs. Hargrave.
translation.zh: 哈格瑞佛太太真是太不幸了
一个寡妇带着一个婴儿

translation.en: A woman alone with two children?
translation.zh: 一个女人独自带着两个孩子？

translation.en: Kearney's strong, and he's still able.
That'll give them a chance. That's more than I can say for us.
translation.zh:
这能给他们一丝生机
留在船上的人就也不一定了

translation.en: But keep it from the rest of the crew.
translation.zh: 不过别把这个消息告诉其他船员

-等到午夜班再说
-遵命 船长

translation.en: Putting us off into the peril of an open sea because some of the crew are ill?
translation.zh:
就因为有船员生病
就要让我们在茫茫大海中漂流？

translation.en: -This is madness. -I'm thinking of your own good, ma'am.
translation.zh:
-这太疯狂了
-我这么做是为你们好 夫人

translation.en: I may be young, but I have spent the last three years
translation.zh: 我或许很年轻 但过去三年来

translation.en: In a climate of fearsome heat with insects as big as rats
translation.zh:
我待在气候奇热无比的地方
那里的虫有老鼠那么大

translation.en: and rats as big as cats.
I can certainly deal with some deckhands down with fever.
translation.zh: 我绝对可以应付发高烧的船员

translation.en: If you stay aboard, you'll die.
translation.zh: 如果你们继续待在船上 会没命的

translation.en: You can't take your sea chest, missus.
translation.zh: 箱子不能带走 夫人

translation.en: But everything we have in the world would be in this chest.
translation.zh: 但我们的全部家当都在这个箱子里

translation.en: Mrs. Hargrave will be taking her belongings.
translation.zh: 哈格瑞佛太太可以带走她的财物

translation.en: Mr. Kearney, a cup of water, please.
translation.zh: 基尔尼先生 请给我一杯水
只剩这么多了 夫人

translation.en: They're in sore need, Mr. Kearney.
translation.zh: 孩子们急需喝水 基尔尼先生

translation.en: Look, the boy ain't yours, so he don't matter too much.
translation.zh:
听着 那男孩不是你亲生的
所以他根本不重要

translation.en: Your infant knows what to do.
translation.zh: 你的婴儿知道该怎么做

translation.en: I'm sick and tired of them two squalling.
translation.zh: 我厌倦了他们两个哭个不停

translation.en: Then, for the love of God, give them water.
translation.zh: 看在上帝的份上 给他们喝水吧
我是个很实际的人 夫人

translation.en: If I was alone, by myself, this could last a good while.
translation.zh:
如果只有我一个人
这些水够我撑上一段时间

translation.en: Sharing four ways makes no sense.
The best thing for all of us is to put them out of their misery.
translation.zh:
对我们来说最好的方法
就是终结他们的痛苦

translation.en: I'll do what has to be done.
translation.zh: 必要时 我会采取行动

translation.en: Shut them up, or they're both going overboard.
translation.zh: 让他们闭嘴 否则我会把他们丢下船

translation.en: Look the other way if you don't want to see.
translation.zh: 如果不想看的话 把头转到另一边去
快点 理查德 快点来
这就对了 真是我的乖女儿
理查德 你待在这里

translation.en: We ate it at the mission.
translation.zh: 传教时我们都吃这种东西
还有香蕉 来吧 理查德

translation.en: We're too exposed on this side.
We've got to find a safe haven out of the weather.
translation.zh: 我们得找一个能遮风避雨的地方

translation.en: Come, Richard. Let's go for a little walk.
translation.zh: 来吧 理查德 我们去散步吧

translation.en: It's all right. Come here, I've got you.
translation.zh: 没事了 过来 我抱住你了

translation.en: Your mama's not here, but I am.
translation.zh: 你妈妈不在 但是我在

translation.en: I'll be your mommy from now on.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我就是你妈妈

translation.en: Any passing ship will be able to see this when it's ablaze.
translation.zh:
只要一点着火
经过的船只就会看到它

translation.en: It won't be long before one finds us.
translation.zh: 很快就会有人发现我们

translation.en: Go to sleep now. Close your eyes.
I know this is your favorite dessert, Richard, but eat more slowly.
translation.zh:
我知道这是你最爱吃的甜点
理查德 但你得慢慢吃

translation.en: And hold the spoon this way, as I've showed you.
translation.zh: 这样拿勺子 我教过你的

translation.en: After the ship comes, you'll find yourself seated
translation.zh: 有船来到这里后 你们将会坐在

translation.en: at a well-appointed table in San Francisco
and be expected to show proper table manners.
translation.zh: 到时候你们得遵守餐桌礼仪

translation.en: Just because we are away from civilization,
translation.zh: 虽然我们远离文明世界

translation.en: does not mean we will behave uncivilized.
translation.zh: 并不表示我们可以做出不文明的行为

translation.en: They come every three months when the moon is full.
translation.zh:
每隔三个月
他们会在满月之时来到这里
上床睡觉 孩子们 快点

translation.en: Tonight you will get your lullaby in the dark.
translation.zh: 今晚你们得在黑暗中听摇篮曲

translation.en: Joy of Heaven to Earth come down
Fix in us thy humble Dwelling

translation.zh: 耶稣 你有慈悲怜悯

translation.en: Mother, why do you wear your clothes when you bathe?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你为什么要穿着衣服洗澡？

translation.en: Why don't Richard and I wear clothes when we bathe?
translation.zh: 理查德跟我洗澡时为什么不穿衣服？

translation.en: I gave up on you two long ago.
translation.zh: 我很早以前就放弃让你们学习礼仪了

translation.en: I'd put your clothes on, and you'd just take them off.
translation.zh:
我帮你们把衣服穿上
但你们马上就脱了

translation.en: -I wish I looked like Richard down there. -Why?
translation.zh:
-我好希望我那里长得跟理查德一样
-为什么？

translation.en: Because he can aim when he goes...
translation.zh: 因为他尿尿时可以瞄得很准…

translation.en: I can hit a mango leaf dead center.
translation.zh: 我可以直接击中芒果树叶

translation.en: Why does he have one he can aim and we don't?
translation.zh:
为什么他有可以瞄准的东西
我们却没有？

translation.en: God, in his infinite wisdom, decided...
translation.zh: 上帝拥有无限的智慧 他决定…

translation.en: Well, nature gave us different parts.
translation.zh: 大自然让男女拥有不同的身体

translation.en: -Well, you see, a female has a-- -A cowrie shell.
Lilli looks like a cowrie shell down there.
So that's what you call mine, a cowrie shell.
translation.zh: 所以你才叫我那里“小贝壳”

translation.en: Never mind. I think this has gone a little far.
translation.zh: 算了 我想我们说得太过火了

translation.en: I should've explained certain of life's facts to you years ago.
translation.zh:
我早该在几年前
就跟你们解释某些生命现象

translation.en: Explain certain of life's facts now.
No, I need to think about it first.
translation.zh: 不 我得先好好想一想

translation.en: I'll explain it to you after your spelling lesson tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚上完拼字课后 我会跟你们解释

translation.en: Let's rinse off. All right? Everybody?
translation.zh: 冲干净 大家都准备好了吗？

translation.en: It was God's commandment that when a man and woman love each other...
translation.zh:
这是上帝的戒律
当一男一女深爱对方时

translation.en: They make promises to each other
in the eyes of God for the whole world to witness.
translation.zh: 在上帝面前及全世界的见证下

translation.en: And that's called the marriage ceremony.
And here is the ceremony your father used to say
translation.zh: 你爸在传教时曾帮人主持结婚典礼

translation.en: when he performed marriages at the mission.
translation.zh:
在结婚典礼上
他常说这样的婚礼主持词

translation.en: What about the life of facts?
When a girl becomes a woman
and a boy becomes a man...
Well, it's different for everyone, but you'll know when it happens to you.
translation.zh:
每个人的情况不一样
但当它发生在你身上时 你会知道的

translation.en: Your body will become rounder. You'll grow breasts like mine.
translation.zh:
你的身体会变得圆润
胸部会变得跟我一样

translation.en: And every month you'll bleed from the opening between your legs.
translation.zh: 你的双腿之间每个月都会流血

translation.en: It only lasts a few days.
And it's a great blessing, because it means you can have a baby.
translation.zh:
这是伟大的恩赐
因为它代表你可以生宝宝

translation.en: But your body will change, too.
translation.zh: 但你的身体也会出现变化

translation.en: Your voice will grow deeper, and you'll grow hair on your face.
translation.zh:
你的声音会变得低沉
脸上会长出胡子

translation.en: And I think you'd look very handsome with a beard.
Unless, of course, you want to scrape it off.
translation.zh: 当然了 除非你想刮掉

translation.en: You can't. You're not ready yet.
translation.zh: 不行 你还没发育成熟

translation.en: When you are, you need the man to make the baby
translation.zh:
发育成熟之后
你需要男人才可以生宝宝
宝宝会在你身体里成长

translation.en: There's a special place inside a woman
translation.zh: 女人的身体里有个很特别的地方

translation.en: where the baby stays nice and warm and safe
translation.zh: 宝宝可以安全舒服地待在那里

translation.en: until it's ready to be born into the world.
translation.zh: 直到它可以诞生在这个世界上

translation.en: How does the baby get in there?
the man and woman lie very...
You know when they get so close you can't tell
translation.zh:
它们紧紧靠在一起时
你根本分辨不出来

translation.en: where one begins and the other ends?
Because the iguanas always have their babies soon after.
translation.zh: 因为不久后 鬣蜥就会生下宝宝
嗯 差不多就是那样

translation.en: That's what I've been waiting to hear all day?
translation.zh: 我等了一整天 就为了听这个？

translation.en: Look what you did to my spear. Go away.
translation.zh: 看看你把我的鱼叉怎样了 快走开

translation.en: Go back out where you belong.
Now what are we gonna do?
What are we gonna do now, Richard?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办 理查德？

translation.en: -What are we gonna do? -Will you just be quiet and let me think?
translation.zh:
-我们该怎么办？
-你能不能闭嘴 让我好好想一想？

translation.en: We're out past sunset. Mother's gonna be so angry.
translation.zh:
太阳已经下山了
妈妈一定会很生气的

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I've got an idea.
translation.zh:
-你在做什么？
-我想到一个点子了

translation.en: Do you realize how late it is?
translation.zh: 你们知道现在有多晚了吗？

translation.en: Yes, Mother, but there was this shark, an old one
translation.zh:
是的 妈妈
但是那只鲨鱼又来了

translation.en: out in the channel. He took half of Richard's spear.
translation.zh:
就是海峡里那只
它把理查德的鱼叉咬掉了一半

translation.en: I have told you to keep away from sharks.
translation.zh: 我叫你们离鲨鱼远一点

translation.en: -The boat drifted loose. -What are the rules, Richard?
translation.zh:
-绳子没绑好 船漂走了
-我们有什么规定 理查德？

-太阳下山时 一定要回家
-还有呢？

translation.en: -Never to the north side of the island. -Do you see that? A full moon.
translation.zh:
-不可以到小岛的北边去
-看到了吗？是满月

translation.en: We are going straight home, and this is never happening again.
translation.zh: 我们得赶快回家 下次不准这样了
来吧 你神秘的访客

translation.en: Whom still I hold, but cannot see!
translation.zh: 虽抓住他 自感悬殊
从前依靠 一一弃遗

translation.en: And I am left alone with Thee
translation.zh: 遗我一人 与你独处

translation.en: Lilli. Richard. Go get some thatch.
translation.zh: 莉莉 理查德 快去拿茅草来

translation.en: "Our Father who art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
translation.zh:
“我们在天上的父
愿人都尊你的名为圣

translation.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done...
translation.zh: 愿你的国降临 愿你的旨意

translation.en: On earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.zh:
行在地上 如同行在天上
我们日用的饮食 今日赐给我们

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.zh: 免我们的债 如同我们免了人的债

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation, But deliver us from evil.
translation.zh: 不叫我们遇见试探 救我们脱离凶恶

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory, forever and ever. Amen."
translation.zh:
因为国度 权柄 荣耀
全是你的 直到永远 阿门”

translation.en: I can feel that the sickness has moved into my lungs now.
translation.zh:
我可以感觉到
现在病魔已经侵入我的肺部

translation.en: And that means I might not get well.
translation.zh: 那表示我的病可能好不了了

translation.en: You may have to be here without me.
translation.zh: 你们或许得相依为命活下去

translation.en: I'll be with your father, and we'll be like guardian angels
translation.zh:
我会跟你父亲在一起
我们会像守护天使一样
这里将是我的长眠之处

translation.en: It's quiet here, and I can see the house.
translation.zh: 这里很安静 我能看见小屋

translation.en: And line it with thatch and moss.
And smooth it over with earth.
I'll write out a prayer for you to say.
translation.zh: 我会写好祈祷文让你们来念

translation.en: We'll carve a marker, and it will say,
translation.zh: 还要做一块墓碑 在上面刻着

translation.en: And I know I'm not your real mother, Richard
translation.zh: 我知道我不是你的生母 理查德

translation.en: but I would like to have it say,
"We pray to the Lord to grant this last abiding wish.
translation.zh:
“我们向上帝祈祷
希望我的遗愿可以实现

translation.en: That Lilli and Richard love one another, and take care of one another
translation.zh: 莉莉跟理查德会相亲相爱 彼此照顾

translation.en: and keep up with their lessons, and be prepared for the ship when it comes.
translation.zh:
谨记所有的教诲
准备好迎接来救他们的船只

-今天的早餐看起来特别好吃
-谢谢

translation.en: Don't forget, it's your turn to cook tomorrow.
translation.zh: 别忘了 明天轮到你煮饭

translation.en: I won't forget. You're the one who always forgets.
translation.zh: 我才不会忘 记性不好的人是你

translation.en: You forgot to color your eggs for the hunt.
translation.zh: 你忘了画寻蛋游戏要用的彩蛋

translation.en: I just don't think we should do it this year.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得今年我们不该这么做

translation.en: But we do it every Easter.
translation.zh: 但我们每年复活节都这么做

translation.en: The marks on the calendar say tomorrow's Easter, so we must have the hunt.
translation.zh:
根据日历上的记号 明天就是复活节
我们得玩寻蛋游戏

translation.en: How else do we know who finds the most eggs and wins?
translation.zh:
不然我们怎么知道
谁能找到最多的蛋 成为赢家？
我不知道 什么都没有

translation.en: I don't understand why we have to do it.
translation.zh: 我不明白我们为什么要这么做

translation.en: Because Mother would want us to.
translation.zh: 因为妈妈希望我们这么做

translation.en: Whoever finds the most eggs this year wins a prize.
translation.zh: 今年找到最多蛋的人可以得到奖品

translation.en: If you win, I've gotta give you something.
translation.zh: 如果你赢了 我得送你一样东西

translation.en: And if I win, you've gotta give me something.
translation.zh: 如果我赢了 你得送我一样东西

translation.en: I hid ten eggs somewhere between the beach and the berry patch.
translation.zh: 我在沙滩跟讲过路附近藏了十颗蛋

translation.en: I hid ten eggs between the rocks and the fern glade.
translation.zh: 我在石头跟蕨类植物附近藏了十颗蛋
我找到九颗 一定是我赢

translation.en: Richard, you were down there so long. What were you doing?
translation.zh: 理查德 你下去好久 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm going to keep this forever.
it looks nice in my hair.
translation.zh: 把它戴在我的头发上会很好看

translation.en: I don't care what you do with it.
translation.zh: 我不在乎你要拿它做什么

translation.en: You can hang it from your nose for all I care.
translation.zh: 就算你挂在鼻子上 我也不管

translation.en: You think this whole reef is yours.
translation.zh: 你以为这整片暗礁都是你的

translation.en: You think you can swallow anything that swims.
translation.zh: 你以为你可以吞下所有会游泳的东西

translation.en: You'd like to catch me, wouldn't you?
But I was too fast for you, stupid sea slug.
translation.zh: 但我游得比你快 大混蛋

translation.en: I can beat you every time.
And if you don't believe me, I'll prove it.
translation.zh: 如果你不相信 我证明给你看

translation.en: The first time he almost got me,
but I was too fast for him.
This time he was lying in wait.
So I dive in, and I can see down his mouth.
translation.zh:
所以我往下潜
我看到它的嘴巴里面

translation.en: There's stripy little fish around his gills.
translation.zh:
身上有条纹的小鱼
在它的鱼鳃附近游来游去

translation.en: He misses me. Stupid sea slug.
translation.zh: 却追不上我 真是一条大笨鱼

translation.en: I don't understand why you have to do it.
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么非要这么做

translation.en: I like the way it makes me feel.

translation.zh: 我知道自己是暗礁之王

translation.en: when I know I'm master of the reef.
The master of the reef. The master of the reef.
Don't you ever make fun of me.

translation.zh: 况且 真正蠢的人是你

translation.en: Always touching yourself and looking at yourself.
translation.zh: 你总是摸自己 照镜子

translation.en: You're always touching those when you look in the mirror.
translation.zh: 你照镜子时 总会摸那里

translation.en: I'm just measuring how much they've grown.
translation.zh: 我只是想知道它们长多大了

translation.en: You shouldn't be looking at me when I'm naked.
translation.zh: 我裸体的时候 你不该看我

translation.en: -I used to see you naked all the time. -Well, it's different now.
translation.zh:
-我以前常看你裸体的样子
-现在不一样了

translation.en: I don't know why it's different, but it is.
translation.zh:
我不知道为什么
但现在就是不一样了

translation.en: I just wish things could be the way they used to be
translation.zh: 我好希望一切能回到以前的样子

translation.en: Remember the seesaw she made us?
translation.zh: 还记得她帮我们做的翘翘板吗？

translation.en: The games we used to play?
You wouldn't mind if I moved my bed to another part of the house?
translation.zh:
你不会介意我把我的床
移到屋里的另一边去吧？

translation.en: If you weren't gonna do it, I was.
translation.zh: 如果你不这样做 我也会的

translation.en: How long have you been there?
I saw the blood on the quilt.
translation.zh: 我看到了被子上的血迹

translation.en: what Mother said would happen when I became a woman?
translation.zh:
妈妈说我成为女人时
会发生什么事吗？

translation.en: I can't sleep with my bed facing the wrong way. Help me move it.
translation.zh:
我的床摆错方向 我睡不着
快来帮我把床搬好

translation.en: -As soon as I'm awake. -You are awake.
translation.zh:
-我睡醒再帮你搬
-你已经醒了

translation.en: Stop it! Let go, I'm not dressed.
translation.zh: 快住手！放开 我没穿衣服

translation.en: What's wrong? You're all humped over.
It gets that way all the time now.
And I can make it go away if I want to, too.
translation.zh: 如果我要的话 也能让它恢复正常

translation.en: If we start keeping secrets, nothing will be the same.
translation.zh:
如果我们无法跟彼此坦诚
一切都无法回到过去

translation.en: Nothing's the same around here anyway. Nothing's the way it used to be!
translation.zh:
一切都已经改变了
无法恢复过去那个样子

translation.en: Come on, let's move your stupid bed.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们去把你的床搬好

translation.en: I don't know what to do.
I'm tired of you always snooping on me. Go away.
translation.zh: 我厌倦了你老是偷看我 快走开

translation.en: I'm sick of you always telling me to go away.
translation.zh: 我厌倦了你老是叫我走开

translation.en: Go away, Richard. I mean it.
translation.zh: 走开 理查德 我是认真的

translation.en: Fine. I'm going where I've always wanted to. To the north side of the island.
translation.zh:
好吧 我要去我一直想去的地方
我要到小岛的北边去

translation.en: No, you can't do that. You know we're in a full moon.
translation.zh:
不 你不能这么做
你知道今天会有满月

translation.en: -I can do whatever I want to do. -No, you can't. It's a rule.
translation.zh:
-我想做什么就做什么
-你不能这么做 这是规定

translation.en: It's not my rule, it was her rule. She wasn't even my real mother anyway.
translation.zh:
这不是我的规定 是她的规定
她根本就不是我的亲生母亲

translation.en: She loved you like she was your real mother.
translation.zh: 她跟亲生母亲一样爱你

translation.en: I'm sick of her rules, and I'm sick of your rules.
translation.zh:
我厌倦了她的规定
也厌倦了你的规定

translation.en: From now on, I can do whatever I want to do.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我想做什么就做什么

translation.en: I can go wherever I want to go, and come home when I want to.
translation.zh:
我想去哪里就去哪里
想什么时候回家就什么时候回家

translation.en: What happened? What have you done?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？你做了什么？

translation.en: There were all these heathens, and they danced around me.
translation.zh: 来了很多异教徒 他们围着我跳舞

translation.en: They didn't see me. If they had, I'd have been dead.
translation.zh:
他们没看到我
要是被他们看到 我必死无疑

translation.en: And there was this one heathen, and at first I wanted to kill him.
translation.zh:
后来只剩下一个异教徒
刚开始我想杀死他

translation.en: And then I didn't want to kill him.
And then I couldn't kill him.
Then he saw you. He'll tell the others.
translation.zh: 然后他看到你了 他会告诉其他人的

translation.en: No. I let him go. Peace.
translation.zh: 不 我放了他 一切都没事了

translation.en: I hope you're right. Richard, I'm so glad you're not hurt.
translation.zh:
我希望你说得对
理查德 你没事 我真的好高兴

translation.en: I thought I'd never see you again. I never want us to fight again.
translation.zh:
我以为再也见不到你了
我再也不想跟你吵架了

-我们还是朋友吗？
-是的 永远都是

translation.en: -I want us to be husband and wife. -Yes.
With this ring, I thee wed.
translation.zh: 戴上这只戒指 你我结为夫妻

translation.en: With this ring, I thee wed, Richard.
translation.zh:
戴上这只戒指
你我结为夫妻 理查德

translation.en: Richard, what if they're heathens? I'm frightened.
translation.zh:
理查德 万一他们是异教徒怎么办？
我好害怕

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't light the signal fire.
translation.zh: 或许我们不该点火求救

translation.en: Let's see who they are first.
translation.zh: 先看看他们是什么人再说

translation.en: The one in the light covering may be a woman.
translation.zh: 戴着浅色遮阳帽那人应该是个女人

文明人 “文化”的文”
“明白”的“明” “人类”的人”

translation.en: Remember what Mother said about a good, firm handshake.
translation.zh:
别忘了妈妈说
要友善 坚定地跟对方握手

translation.en: We've been waiting for you for a long time.
translation.zh: 我们等你们等了很久了

translation.en: I'm Lilli, and I'm ready for you to take us back to civilization.
translation.zh:
我叫莉莉 我已经准备好
让你们带我们重返文明世界

translation.en: I am Capt. Jacob Hilliard, master of the Trade Wind.
translation.zh:
我是“贸易风”号的
杰柯伯西莱德船长

translation.en: And we... Is this your land?
translation.zh: 我们…这里是你们的土地吗？
对 我的房子在那里

translation.en: Well, we're in need of fresh water. Our casks are fouled.
translation.zh: 我们需要淡水 我们的水桶坏了

translation.en: Will you grant us permission to come ashore?
translation.zh: 你们能允许我们登岸吗？

translation.en: If you don't mind covering yourself, I'll get my daughter.
translation.zh:
请穿上衣服
我介绍我女儿跟你们认识

translation.en: Does that binding around your neck choke you?
translation.zh:
你脖子周围那一圈东西
会让你喘不过气吗？
我真的很感激 如果你…

translation.en: How do you catch fish with that spear?
translation.zh: 你用那根鱼叉怎么抓鱼？

translation.en: Blow a man's head right off his shoulders.

translation.zh: 与世隔绝的人 真令人兴奋

translation.en: They seem to be an odd mixture of knowledge and ignorance.
translation.zh:
他们似乎什么都知道
却又有很无知

translation.en: Their attire is a little bit...
The color, it's the same as the sky.
translation.zh: 颜色跟天空的颜色一样

translation.en: Oh, he's not my brother. He's my husband.
translation.zh: 他不是我哥哥 他是我丈夫

translation.en: -How do you follow the years? -She taught us.
translation.zh:
-你们怎么撑过来的？
-我们照她说的去做

translation.en: We count the moons. We know that twelve full moons are one year.
translation.zh:
我们会看月亮
知道一年会出现十二次满月

translation.en: We have Christmas and Thanksgiving and Easter.
translation.zh: 我们会过圣诞节 感恩节和复活节

translation.en: Although we're not exactly sure we celebrate them on the right days.
translation.zh:
虽然我们不确定
庆祝的方法到底对不对

translation.en: It's utterly amazing, the two of you all these years...
translation.zh:
真的太神奇了
这么多年来你们两个…
不是荒芜之地 西莱德船长

translation.en: You do set an excellent table.
Look, Sylvia. They've fashioned their own dinnerware.
translation.zh:
你看 席薇雅
他们的餐具都是自己做的
杯子 汤匙 巧夺天工

translation.en: Won't Mr. Quinlan be joining us?
Mr. Quinlan is a seafarer and prefers to be by himself.
translation.zh: 昆兰先生是船员 他喜欢单独用餐

translation.en: It's plain to see why you've been lost for so long.
translation.zh: 这么久都没有人发现你们是有原因的

translation.en: The charts don't even show this island.
translation.zh: 地图上没有标志这座小岛

translation.en: It's a wonder we found you.
translation.zh: 我们能发现你们真是奇迹

translation.en: Heathens come to the north side of the island, at certain times.
translation.zh:
异教徒会在特定的时间
到小岛的北边来

translation.en: A great treat from the slop we have to eat on the ship.
translation.zh: 比我们船上的剩饭剩菜好吃多了

translation.en: Well, only the broth is eel.
The little white chunks are sea urchin.
We appreciate your hospitality and hope
that you'll offer us the opportunity to repay you.
translation.zh: 希望我们能有机会报答你们

translation.en: You can take us with you, back to civilization.
translation.zh: 你们可以带我们重返文明世界

translation.en: It must be awfully boring here.
Well, boring is when you have nothing whatever to do.

translation.zh: 就像你们在这里的生活

translation.en: Boots, and a shirt, and cotton trousers.
translation.zh: 靴子 衬衫和纯棉裤

translation.en: I'll let Sylvia explain the female garments.
translation.zh: 我请席薇雅来解释女性的服装

translation.en: I remember buttons on Mother's dress.
translation.zh: 我还记得妈妈洋装上的钮扣

translation.en: Richard, you'll have to turn your head.
translation.zh: 理查德 你得把头转过去

translation.en: I'm going to show Lillian a foundation garment.
Although, I dare say, there isn't much you haven't seen.
translation.zh: 但我猜你应该看过她的全身了

translation.en: -What does it do? -It goes around the waist, like this.
translation.zh:
-这是做什么用的？
-它要穿在腰上面 就像这样

translation.en: Don't look yet, Richard. I'm showing Lillian my secrets.
translation.zh:
你还不能看 理查德
我要让莉莉安看我的秘密
这是梳子 还有粉扑

translation.en: Except for the hue of your skin, but we can fix that.
translation.zh: 除了你的肤色 不过我们可以想办法

translation.en: The sun has tainted it all brown.
We'll have to lighten it with lemon juice.
translation.zh: 我们得用柠檬汁帮你漂白

translation.en: Well, you don't want people in San Francisco
to think you're a field hand, do you?
You do look handsome in your boulevard suit.
Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?
translation.zh:
你觉得我的胭脂
擦得太重了吗 理查德？
谢谢你 好心的先生

translation.en: Now I'm all powder and paint with nothing to do, as usual.
translation.zh:
我已经化好妆
却无所事事 跟平常一样

translation.en: We could go outside and count stars.
translation.zh: 我们可以去外面数星星

translation.en: Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?
Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing.
translation.zh: 有时我会口哨 我们一起唱歌

translation.en: Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.
translation.zh: 有时候我们交欢 有时候我们睡觉

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
translation.zh:
来吧 理查德
我们给席薇雅看我们的舞姿

translation.en: Come on, Sylvia. You try it.
translation.zh: 来吧 席薇雅 试试看

translation.en: I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple-minded.
translation.zh:
那根本不叫做跳舞
太幼稚了 太白痴了

translation.en: Grown people don't dance like that.
translation.zh: 大人们不会那样子跳舞

translation.en: Maybe we should learn a grown-up dance for San Francisco?
translation.zh:
或许我们学一下大人们是怎么跳舞的
这样就可以到旧金山去

translation.en: It's a bit naughty. It's called the Spanish polka.
translation.zh: 这种舞有点活泼 叫西班牙波尔卡舞

translation.en: Kiss me, darling, on the cheek
translation.zh: 亲爱的 亲吻的脸颊

translation.en: One, two, three. One, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.zh:
一 二 三 一 二 三
一 二 三

translation.en: You're a beautiful dancer, Richard. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 你跳得很棒 理查德 一 二 三

translation.en: Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.
translation.zh: 莉莉安得重新学习一下礼仪

translation.en: It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
translation.zh:
上课上到一半
丢下客人跑掉是不礼貌的

translation.en: Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
translation.zh: 对不起 但她得等我们跳完再说

translation.en: One, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一 二 三 一 二 三

translation.en: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
When did I lie to you?
You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
translation.zh: 你曾经说过你永远不会伤害我

translation.en: When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
translation.zh: 你老是盯着她看 我觉得很难过

translation.en: It's just that she's so different.
The way she's all covered up.
But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
translation.zh:
但你说过你觉得
那些衣服很蠢而且完全没必要

translation.en: It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
translation.zh:
只是…我想知道
她不穿衣服是什么样子

translation.en: You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
translation.zh:
你是说你因为看不到
所以很想看看她没穿衣服的样子？

translation.en: You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island
translation.zh: 还记得我因为不能去小岛的北边

translation.en: And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
translation.zh:
我还记得你真的去了之后
差点发生了什么事

translation.en: -What have you done to yourself? -Don't you like it?
translation.zh:
-你把自己弄成什么样了？
-你不喜欢吗？

translation.en: You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
translation.zh: 你不喜欢我这样 却喜欢席薇雅这样
拜托 莉莉安 别跟我吵架

-我们说好永远都不吵架的
-没错

translation.en: You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
translation.zh: 你好久都没吃早餐了 你生病了吗？

translation.en: Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
translation.zh: 理查德 我准备好要上课了

translation.en: I promised to teach her how to fish.
Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
translation.zh: 我们一起在这个漂亮的鱼塘里
大家都可以清楚地看到

translation.en: But look at this, kind sir.
translation.zh: 不过看看这个 好心的先生

translation.en: All we have to do is lower our heads...
And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
So we can do whatever we want.
Come on, don't be like that.
He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
translation.zh:
他听不到的 他会跟席薇雅小姐
鬼混上好几个小时

translation.en: -Where's your lovely pearl? -I don't know what you mean.
translation.zh:
-你漂亮的珍珠在哪里？
-我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?
translation.zh:
你戴在头发上的白色珠子
它在哪里？

translation.en: It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
translation.zh: 现在不是你想莉莉的时候

translation.en: I told her I'd never hurt her.
translation.zh: 我跟她说过我永远不会伤害她

translation.en: Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
translation.zh:
别为她感到难过 理查德
你完全是属于她一个人的

translation.en: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.
translation.zh: 但你不是她的占有物 你们没结婚

translation.en: A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
translation.zh:
你们两个在丛林里
自己宣布结婚根本不算数

translation.en: Why don't you just follow your heart.
translation.zh: 你为何不听从你的心声？

translation.en: You can't just leave me here.
You'll never fit in civilized society.
translation.zh: 你永远都无法融入文明社会

translation.en: -That came from the house. -Get the other rifle, quickly.
translation.zh:
-枪声是从屋子那边传来的
-快去拿枪
昆兰 你会杀死他的
好了 昆兰 够了

translation.en: You heard me, I said enough.
translation.zh: 你听见我的话了 我说够了

translation.en: Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
translation.zh:
你别管 吉登斯
我要把他的头扭断

translation.en: You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
translation.zh:
你听到船长的话了 快把枪放下
不然你得以抗命的罪名接受处罚

-昆兰 把枪放下
-小心 理查德！

translation.en: I always weather a storm well.
translation.zh: 我是个禁得起打击的人

translation.en: -I get that from Mother. -Yes, you do.
Capt. Hilliard says he wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.zh: 西莱德船长说他预计黎明时出发

translation.en: I guess that means Capt. Hilliard's daughter wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.zh:
我猜那表示西莱德的女儿
想在黎明时出发

translation.en: I don't care what she wants.
I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
translation.zh:
我根本就不在乎她
我现在知道了 莉莉

translation.en: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
translation.zh: 你不知道吗？你是我最重要的人

translation.en: You can set sail at dawn.
That lullaby she used to sing to us?
translation.zh: 她以前常唱的那首摇篮曲吗？

translation.en: Will you teach me to play it on this?
translation.zh: 你能教我怎么用口哨吹那首歌吗？

translation.en: I'm going to have use for it.
There's a baby growing inside of me.
A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
And I won't let it be born in civilization.
translation.zh: 我不会让这孩子在文明世界出生

translation.en: I want it to be born right here.
translation.zh: 我希望这孩子在这里出生

translation.en: Where there's no evil, and no lies, and no guns.
translation.zh: 这里没有邪恶 谎言 也没有枪
